Margaret Nakhla ( Arabic ) bụ onye Egypt nke oge a na-ese ihe (1908–1977).
Nakhla, onye a mụrụ na 12/10/1908 na Alexandria, gụrụ nka na France ọkachamara na eserese mmanụ
O nwetara diplọma nkuzi ya n'afọ 1939, wee mụọ nka nke eserese mgbidi na École du Louvre n'afọ 1951
Ọ kụziri na Institute of Fine Arts for Girls, Egypt
O bi na Alexandria, Paris, Cairo na Port Said.
1965 onyinye oge niile nke mmepụta nka maka otu afọ
Ìgwè ndị mmadụ pụrụ iche n'ụlọ na mba ofesi

Iji tụgharịa uche na eserese nke Margaret Nakhla ọtụtụ ìgwè mmadụ, mgbe ụfọdụ na-enyo enyo na izi ezi nke echiche ahịa ahịa Vlouhadtha ndị mmadụ na-achọsi ike na ego dị ịtụnanya iburu n'uche na okwu ndị a nwere onyinyo nke okike, mana n'etiti mkpofu nke onye na-ese ihe, abụwo onye na-ese ihe nwere ụzọ niile nke ịdepụta na ikike dị elu, n'otu oge ahụ, ha emeela ka echiche mara echiche mara ọkwa mmadụ.
